mapper.select: select num, thumbnail, writer, subject, email, content, image, passwd, reg_date, readcount, ip, r from (select num, thumbnail, writer, subject, email, content, image, passwd, reg_date, readcount, ip, rownum r from (select * from imageboard1 order by reg_date desc) order by reg_date desc) where r >= #{startRow} and r <= #{endRow}
select count(*) from imageboard1 where writer = #{memId}

select num, thumbnail, writer, subject, email, content, image, passwd, reg_date, readcount, ip, r from (select num, thumbnail, writer, subject, email, content, image, passwd, reg_date, readcount, ip, rownum r from (select * from imageboard1 where writer = #{memId} order by reg_date desc) order by reg_date desc) where r >= #{startRow} and r <= #{endRow}
mapper.update: update imageboard1 set readcount = #{readcount} where num = #{num}
mapper.select: select count(*) from subboard1 where boardnum = #{num}

select num, writer, content, reg_date, ip, ref, re_step, re_level, r from (select num, writer, content, reg_date, ip, ref, re_step, re_level, rownum r from (select * from (select * from subboard1 where boardnum = #{num}) order by ref desc, re_step asc) order by ref desc, re_step asc ) where r >= #{startRow} and r <= #{endRow}
select last_number from user_sequences where sequence_name = upper('subboard_seq')
mapper.update: update subboard1 set re_step = re_step + 1 where ref = #{ref} and re_step > #{re_step}
